src:
Nenadoma je stopila pred njega, odpeljal jo je rešilec
Zgodilo se je sredi dneva.
07 Nov 2019, 13:18 by T. V.
LJUBLJANA – V torek okoli 12. ure se je na ulici Ob železnici zgodila prometna nesreča, v kateri sta bila udeležena voznik kombija in peška.Po zbranih obvestilih policije je voznik kombija vozil po ulici, ko je nenadoma pred njega na vozišče stopila peška, ki je hotela prečkati vozišče.Voznik kombija je trčil v peško, ki se je lažje poškodovala. S kraja je bila odpeljana z reševalnim vozilom.Po vseh zbranih obvestilih bodo policisti ustrezno ukrepali.
text:
Suddenly she stepped in front of him, being taken by ambulance
It happened in the middle of the day.
07 Nov 2019, 12:18 by T.V.
LJUBLJANA - A car accident involving a van driver and a pedestrian occurred on the Ob Railway Street on Tuesday around 12 noon. According to police reports, the driver of the van was driving down the street when a pedestrian suddenly entered the carriageway in front of him. She wanted to cross the carriageway. The driver of the van collided with a pedestrian, which was more easily damaged. She was taken by ambulance to the scene.After all the information collected, police officers will take appropriate action.
